definition[0]: to accept a difficult situation that is likely to continue for a long time
example[0]: You have to learn to live with stress.
example[1]: He has lived with his illness for most of his life.
definition[1]: to live in the same house as someone and have a sexual relationship with them without being married

definition[2]: if something lives with you, it stays in your mind
example[3]: That episode has lived with me all my life.
